body:
Comment 6 by **atkaaz**: 
> I do not see any problem with go command. If you do, then show me.

make a simple test:

package demlinks

import "testing"

func TestNothing(t *testing.T) {
	t.FailNow()
}

run `go test` and observe in %TEMP% the folders being created on each `go test` run,
aren't deleted

this fails to delete them: 
http://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/src/cmd/go/test.go#970
